title: David Gigolayev
text:
David Vadimovich Gigolayev (; born 31 March 1989) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He plays for <a href="FC%20Mashuk-KMV%20Pyatigorsk">FC Mashuk-KMV Pyatigorsk</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Alania%20Vladikavkaz">FC Alania Vladikavkaz</a> on 24 June 2011 in a game against <a href="FC%20Mordovia%20Saransk">FC Mordovia Saransk</a>.
